attributes.header-text: An official website of the United States government

components.content: Brief instructions for completing this form.
We need some basic information to locate your military records.

attributes.name: serviceName
attributes.label: Name used during service (last, first, full middle)

attributes.name: vaClaimFiled
attributes.label: Yes - provide VA claim/file number if known

components.content: Please provide information about all military service periods. This helps us locate the correct records.
For an effective records search, it is important that ALL service be shown.
Select the specific documents or information you're requesting from the military records.

attributes.hint: Contains information used to verify military service
attributes.name: dd214
attributes.label: DD Form 214 or equivalent

attributes.hint: Personal information will be blacked out
attributes.name: dd214Deleted
attributes.label: I want a DELETED copy of DD Form 214

attributes.name: dd214Years
attributes.label: Year(s) DD Form 214 was issued (Date of Separation)

attributes.hint: Includes duty stations, training, awards, and other personnel actions
attributes.name: ompf
attributes.label: Official Military Personnel File (OMPF)

attributes.hint: Includes health, extended ambulatory, and dental records
attributes.name: medicalRecords
attributes.label: Medical Records

components.content: Required unless you are the veteran. This helps ensure the fastest possible response.

attributes.name: relationship
attributes.label: I am the military service member or veteran

attributes.name: relationship
attributes.label: I am the deceased veteran's next-of-kin

attributes.name: relationship
attributes.label: I am the veteran's legal guardian

components.content: Please review your information before submitting your request for military records.

attributes.section1-content:
Name: [Entered value]
Social Security: [Entered value]
Date of birth: [Entered value]
Place of birth: [Entered value]
attributes.section2-content:
Branch: [Entered value]
Service dates: [Entered dates]
Service type: [Officer/Enlisted]
Last duty station: [Entered value]
attributes.section3-content:
Documents requested: [Selected items]
Purpose: [Selected purposes]
Relationship to veteran: [Selected relationship]

components.content: By submitting this request, you declare under penalty of perjury that the information provided is true and correct, and you authorize the release of the requested information.
